mapper.insert: insert into hospital.term_approval(follow_up_group_id, department_id, classification, name, submitter, submission_time, state) values (#{followUpGroupId}, #{departmentId}, #{classification}, #{name}, #{submitter}, #{submissionTime}, #{state})
